node.Title: Forecast and Recommendations: 2022 Elastic Global Threat Report

Generate RUM-based metrics to track historical trends in customer experience
node.Description: Datadog Real User Monitoring (RUM) provides end-to-end visibility into the user experience and performance of your browser and mobile applications. RUM allows you to capture and retain complete user sessions for 30 days. This means you can pinpoint bugs, prioritize issues, and determine fixes with data collected across an entire quarter.We’re excited to announce that you can now go further with your data by generating metrics from all of your RUM events.

node.Title: Elastic Stack 8.5.1 released
node.Description:
Version 8.5.1 of the Elastic Stack was released today. We recommend you upgrade to this latest version. We recommend 8.5.1 over the previous 8.5.0 version.

For details of the issues that have been fixed and a full list of changes for each product in this version, refer to the release notes:

8.5.1 Release Notes

Elastic Stack

  • Elasticsearch
  • Kibana
  • Beats
  • Logstash

Elastic Enterprise Search

  • Enterprise Search

Elastic Observability

  • APM

Elastic Security

  • Elastic Security Solution

node.Title: Snyk’s ultimate AWS re:Invent 2022 survival guide
node.Description: We asked a few of the AWS re:Invent conference veterans on our team to share some words of wisdom in preparation for this year’s expo. Read on to see their tips on surviving Vegas, and making the most of your time at AWS re:Invent 2022.

node.Title: Stuck in the Middle: Conquering Writer’s Block
node.Description:
The nightmare begins something like this: You’re in your groove, typing or scribbling away. The words are flowing beautifully, then, suddenly… nothing. You’ve hit a wall. All momentum vanishes. You can’t focus. You can’t think. Your frustration boils over, and the words are abandoned. Pretty scary, huh? Every writer has moments like this. Maybe you’re stumped about what comes next, unsure of how to move forward. Or perhaps your motivation

Continue reading...

node.Title: Welcome to the Supercloud (and Developer Week 2022)
node.Description: Every developer wants to get code running on one machine and perfect it. It’s so much easier to work that way. We just happen to have one machine that scales to the size of the Internet: a global, distributed, supercomputer. It’s our Supercloud, and we build our own products on it, and you can too

node.Title: Cloudflare Workers scale too well and broke our infrastructure, so we are rebuilding it on Workers

node.Title: Build applications of any size on Cloudflare with the Queues open beta
node.Description: Cloudflare Queues enables developers to build performant and resilient distributed applications that span the globe. Any developer with a paid Workers plan can enroll in the Open Beta and start building today!

node.Title: The road to a more standards-compliant Workers API
node.Description: We have been making improvements in the Workers runtime to increase alignment with Web Platform standards around event handling, task cancellation using AbortController, text encoding and decoding, URL parsing and pattern matching, and streams support.
